hours_text:
## Come Visit Us!

Experience the Beauty & History of LMU's Campus

We encourage all prospective students to come to campus for a visit. Breathe our air for a while. Walk around. Chat with students, or with professors. This is the best way to experience life at LMU.

**Tours** may be scheduled by calling the Admissions Office at 423.869.6280 or 1.800.325.0900, or you can [sign up online](https://lmunet.my.salesforce-sites.com/events/#/search#/search) (select "Campus Tour").

### Office of Admissions

Lincoln Memorial University  
6965 Cumberland Gap Parkway  
Harrogate, TN 37752

Call: 423.869.3611 or 800.325.0900

[Email us](mailto:Admissions@LMUnet.edu)  
[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Lincoln+Memorial+University/@36.5774263,-83.6635453,17.09z/data=!4m15!1m8!3m7!1s0x885c837a6d3a9395:0x48ade9b54c461138!2s6965+Cumberland+Gap+Pkwy,+Harrogate,+TN+37752!3b1!8m2!3d36.5776791!4d-83.6675406!16s%2Fg%2F11c5cj__75!3m5!1s0x885c83718779150d:0xe6f55823e4978eb4!8m2!3d36.5773818!4d-83.6612854!16zL20vMDRsYm1i)  
[Campus Maps](campus-map.php)

## Need a Place to Stay?

Here are a few links to local lodging options

If you need a place to stay while you're here, we recommend the following area hotels:

  * [Sleep Inn & Suites](https://www.reservations.com/hotel/sleep-inn-and-suites-middlesboro-ky?rmcid=rcc16&rmcid=tophotels6&utm_source=googleads&gclid=CjwKCAjwq9mLBhB2EiwAuYdMtYoizltU9NmLcE_lFRjIw7b5lPH4avmb3jLQWC0t4b4libUNHZKv9RoC5V4QAvD_BwE), Middlesboro, KY 606.576.7829
  * ...

accessibility_text:
LMU is committed to providing accessible educational support services to enable students with disabilities to participate in, and benefit from, all University programs and activities. Every effort is made to reasonably accommodate the needs of a student with a disability. It is important for students to understand that it is the student's responsibility to request accessibility services at a post-secondary institution, and timely requests for services are imperative for the best possible outcomes in seeking and receiving reasonable accommodations. Our mission is to work with you as a team to remove barriers that may hinder your ability to fully participate in the academic experience at Lincoln Memorial University.

Accessible educational support services are administered by the Office of Accessible Education Services. Any issues related to accessibility, the Americans with Disabilities Act ("ADA"), or Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 ("Section 504") should be directed to: 

**Jason Davis, Director**  
Office Location: Carnegie Vincent Library - 105  
Phone: 423.869.6587  
[jason.davis@LMUnet.edu](mailto:jason.davis@lmunet.edu)

## Documents Needed When Applying for Accommodations

  1. [**Student Request for Accommodations Form**](documents/Student_Request_For_Accomodations.pdf). This form must be submitted EACH semester.  
**Deadlines:**
     * Fall: September 1st
     * Spring: February 1st
     * Summer: June 1st
  2. **Medical Documentation/Comprehensive Eval...
